org.afree.chart.block

Class BlockContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.block.AbstractBlock
      • org.afree.chart.block.BlockContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LegendItemBlockContainer

    public class BlockContainer
extends AbstractBlock
implements Block, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    A container for a collection of Block objects. The container uses an Arrangement object to handle the position of each block.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates a new instance with default settings.
      BlockContainer(Arrangement arrangement)
      Creates a new instance with the specified arrangement.
